text: Ani jevha amhi pharistyanna adesa dila ki adamacya pudhe sajada kara, tevha iblisa (saitana) kherija sarvanni sajada kela to jinnampaiki hota. Tyane apalya palanakartyacya adesaci avajna keli. Kaya tarihi tumhi tyala ani tyacya santatila, mala soduna apala mitra banavita ahata? Vastavika to tumha sarvanca satru ahe. Asa julami lokanca kiti va'ita mobadala ahe
